title: Leaverbuster makes me never play 3 times straight.
body:
I got leaver buster from my router disconnecting, and it is 20 minutes, which means i usually join queue, leave for about 15 minutes, and come back, but for 3 TIMES, I leave the lobby and the wait does nothing, which means i have to do it all over again!  60 minutes of wasted time.

Here is a link: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1JaxRJHLK1uAndnexvhOkJdctv6VO9OA4a29f7ryNE1E/edit?usp=sharing

replies.body: If you're waiting through your low priority queue but you get up for awhile and come back to see that there's not a match or timer, chances are the timer finished and then you missed when the queue popped. I know it's not what you're wanting to hear, but missing a queue while in low-priority will extend the duration of your queues.

No, I just sat through the whole thing until 19:00 but sometime between that it took me out of the lobby while I waited and I know that if i left queue I would have to do it all over again. I finally got a game in after waiting 100 minutes! WHICH is what I  WOULD have waited for all 5 of my leaverbuster games!! ARRGh
